name: Broadmoor Heights Peak
address: 2248 Beckham Drive NE, Rio Rancho, New Mexico 87144
description:
ABOUT THE HOME ENERGY RATING SCALE
The HERS (Home Energy Rating System) Index allows buyers to compare the relative energy efficiency of different homes. The HERS Index home energy rating is determined by an independent RESNET-certified home energy rater ("Rater"). The lower a home’s score, the more energy efficient it is in comparison to the HERS referenced home. For every one-point decrease in the HERS Index score, there is a corresponding one percent (1%) reduction in energy consumption as compared to a home with a HERS Index of 100. A home with a HERS score of 100 reflects a home built to 2006 IEEC Building Codes. See the bottom of this page for more information on HERS scores.

amenities.name: Stories
amenities.description: Broadmoor Heights provides 1 and 2-story new construction home designs that fits that way you live

amenities.name: Personalize your
amenities.description: Personalize your home by working with a professional designer to select cabinets, flooring, lighting and more

amenities.name: Life Tested®
amenities.description: Life Tested® features offered including Pulte Planning Center®, and Life Tested® Living Spaces

amenities.name: Home Designs
amenities.description: Energy Efficiency Features and Smart Home Technology in every home

amenities.name: Home Designs
amenities.description: Be involved in the building processes with Pulte Homes Build Quality Experience

amenities.name: Minutes great
amenities.description: Minutes from great eateries and shopping

amenities.name: Close proximity
amenities.description: Close proximity to Santa Ana Star Center - for sporting events, Broadway shows, rodeos, concerts and more

amenities.name: This community
amenities.description: This community includes a Fiber network that provides fast, reliable, multi-user Internet needed in homes today and in the future

amenities.name: Close Proximity
amenities.description: Close Proximity to Rio Rancho’s Largest Employers: Intel, Hewlett-Packard, and Presbyterian – Rust Medical Hospital
